entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
